author: Ed Cara
title: New Research Debunks Myth That Brain Cells Stop Growing After Childhood
description: New research shows that adults' brains still carry stem cells that grow, divide, and eventually become new mature neurons.
content:
You’ve probably heard the old canard that new brain cells simply stop forming as we become adults. But research out today is the latest to show that this isn’t really true.

title: Starmer says fixing welfare is a 'moral imperative'
description: The prime minister described the benefits system as "broken" a day after he was forced to U-turn on plans for reforms.
content:
Sir Keir Starmer has said the UK's benefits system is broken and fixing it is a "moral imperative", a day after a backbench Labour revolt saw him forced into a U-turn on welfare cuts.
